document.query: INSERT INTO `site` (`id`, `source`, `company_name`, `company_address`, `support_email`, `domain`, `reseller_website`, `short_url`, `image_url_path`, `theme_color`, `deleted`, `created_at`) VALUES (NULL, 'FTAG', 'FTAG', '2A Hoot Kiam Road Singapore 249391 ', 'pay.ftag@gmail.com', 'https://pay.ftag.com', 'https://admin.ftag.com', 'https://pay.ftag.com', 'https://pay.ftag.com/images/ftag/', '#38a8f9', '', NOW());
